tracking.title: Track Your Order
tracking.subtitle: All order updates will be available through this link.

TICKET_CREATED.title: Order Created
TICKET_CREATED.description: Your order is created, Bosta will pick it up once your shipper is ready

PACKAGE_RECEIVED.title: Package Received
PACKAGE_RECEIVED.description: Order is received at Bosta warehouses and being processed.

IN_TRANSIT.title: In Transit
IN_TRANSIT.description: Order is being transferred to Bosta's Hubs.

WAITING_FOR_CUSTOMER_ACTION.title: Waiting for Customer Action
WAITING_FOR_CUSTOMER_ACTION.description: Order is waiting for customer action

order.not_found: No record of this tracking number can be found at this time, please check the number and try again later. For further assistance, please contact Customer Service.
